g.text: An individual's personal sense of being a man, woman,
boy, girl, nonbinary, or something else.
for use in diagnostics, analytics, and treatments.
code or constrained text: SFCU Category 1..1
Name to be used with interactions.
Pronouns to be used with interactions.
Documentation of a specific instance of sex and/or gender information.
code or constrained text: Recorded Sex or Gender 1..1
code or constrained text: International Equivalent Recorded Sex or Gender 0..1
Some standards have person or patient classes to be extended
Others have segments or attributes to be extended.
The following model elements can change over time.
Used during clinical activities like orders,
This captures a recorded value that
may be labeled as sex or gender:
Name usage applies to more than sex and gender uses.
The use of the appropriate name is important
Pronoun usage is defined just for English language usage.
Similar issues in other languages are a future effort.
